# message

**Instance Property**

A localized, user-facing string that describes the error.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute DOMString message;
```

## Discussion

Provide a short, custom, localized error message that helps the user resolve the issue. This message appears on the Apple Pay sheet.

## Error Properties

- **code**: The error code for this instance.
- **contactField**: The field name that contains the error on the payment sheet.

items.description: The error code for this instance.
